channel.title: Investings on JStock U.S. Investing
channel.description: Recent content in Investings on JStock U.S. Investing

item.title: Investing
item.description: Where is dividends paid? In your Live Investing Account, if you own a company that pays dividend, these funds will be paid into your account. Once deposited, you can decide what to do with these funds - reinvest back into new investments, keep them in cash in your account or withdraw the money.
